医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
海鸟的偷食行为可能会促进致命禽流感的传播自 2021 年以来，致命的 H5N1 禽流感病毒已导致全球数百万只鸟类死亡，并且在极少数情况下可以传播给人类，该病毒可能通过一些海鸟的偷食行为传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Seabirds-food-stealing-behavior-may-facilitate-spread-of-deadly-avian-flu.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Seabirds-food-stealing-behavior-may-facilitate-spread-of-deadly-avian-flu.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3edb9ca3-d471-47a8-bbf3-f3487f9e5f78 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:22:35 -0400 Seabirds' food-stealing behavior may facilitate spread of deadly avian flu
研究表明青少年轻度创伤性脑损伤后抑郁症并未增加根据美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 的数据，2021 年约有 214,110 例创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 和超过 69,000 例与 TBI 相关的死亡，了解 TBI 的身心后果对于研究至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-shows-no-increase-in-depression-after-mild-TBI-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-shows-no-increase-in-depression-after-mild-TBI-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39a62e02-849e-4047-ab85-9c1b1b4edac6 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:13:38 -0400 Study shows no increase in depression after mild TBI in adolescents
研究显示长期新冠肺炎儿童体位不耐受的发生率较高肯尼迪克里格研究所的一项新研究表明，大多数被诊断患有长期新冠肺炎的儿童可能会出现直立不耐受（OI），这种情况会导致身体在站立时难以调节血压和心率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-reveals-high-incidence-of-orthostatic-intolerance-in-children-with-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-reveals-high-incidence-of-orthostatic-intolerance-in-children-with-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3908ce4-37d5-433c-9341-34dc08ace964 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:08:15 -0400 Study reveals high incidence of orthostatic intolerance in children with long COVID
ESMO 2024：妇科癌症免疫治疗和抗体药物偶联物取得可喜成果ESMO 2024 上报告的研究揭示了患有早期子宫内膜癌和宫颈癌的新女性群体，她们通过在当前标准治疗中添加免疫疗法获得了具有临床意义的益处，而一项首次人体研究发现新型抗体药物具有“有前景”的抗肿瘤活性针对接受过多次治疗的卵巢癌和子宫内膜癌患者的紧密蛋白 6 蛋白结合物 (ADC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/ESMO-2024-Promising-results-in-immunotherapy-and-antibody-drug-conjugates-for-gynecological-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/ESMO-2024-Promising-results-in-immunotherapy-and-antibody-drug-conjugates-for-gynecological-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca559b08-5ea7-4b1d-b77c-b4bc2ccf1e44 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:59:00 -0400 ESMO 2024: Promising results in immunotherapy and antibody drug conjugates for gynecological cancers
加泰罗尼亚研究强调学龄儿童不健康零食的趋势世界卫生组织（WHO）多年来一直对世界各地儿童超重和肥胖持续增加表示担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Catalonia-study-highlights-unhealthy-snack-trends-among-school-ged-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Catalonia-study-highlights-unhealthy-snack-trends-among-school-ged-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaaa7d08-269f-496c-90b3-774957072e01 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:54:34 -0400 Catalonia study highlights unhealthy snack trends among school-aged children
免疫疗法在晚期黑色素瘤和其他癌症中的长期益处凸显ESMO 2024 上报告的大型国际研究结果显示，免疫疗法通过使人体免疫系统识别并消灭癌细胞来发挥作用，可提高晚期黑色素瘤患者的长期总体生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Long-term-benefits-of-immunotherapy-highlighted-in-advanced-melanoma-and-other-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Long-term-benefits-of-immunotherapy-highlighted-in-advanced-melanoma-and-other-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78cad00a-0998-453c-bed9-896e0c9ecc17 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:48:06 -0400 Long-term benefits of immunotherapy highlighted in advanced melanoma and other cancers
受大脑启发的材料为高效计算铺平了道路来自德克萨斯农工大学、桑迪亚国家实验室-利弗莫尔和斯坦福大学的一组研究人员正在从大脑中汲取经验教训，设计材料以实现更高效的计算。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Brain-inspired-materials-pave-the-way-for-efficient-computing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Brain-inspired-materials-pave-the-way-for-efficient-computing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d03f91c-338b-43e5-89d0-db4a412a8bbe Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:43:47 -0400 Brain-inspired materials pave the way for efficient computing
2024 年 ESMO 大会将推出面向未来的癌症治疗方法2024 年 ESMO 大会将举行新闻发布会，介绍和讨论“放眼未来”主席研讨会 3，该研讨会将提出有潜力在（不久的）未来成为癌症治疗中日益有效和有影响力的重要方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/ESMO-Congress-2024-to-unveil-future-focused-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/ESMO-Congress-2024-to-unveil-future-focused-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e620d04f-b7af-46a5-bbfa-2225ebeea570 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:39:00 -0400 ESMO Congress 2024 to unveil future-focused cancer treatments
研究发现早年逆境会影响土拨鼠的寿命生命早期的逆境可能会对人们的健康产生永久性的影响；即使他们的情况后来显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Early-life-adversity-found-to-impact-marmot-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Early-life-adversity-found-to-impact-marmot-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27dad9b5-ef3d-44a9-b96d-7561a432e2a6 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:31:03 -0400 Early life adversity found to impact marmot longevity
美国发现的新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 病例的六个月意外模式根据今天发表在《科学报告》上的新研究，美国的 COVID-19 病例每六个月在南部各州和北部各州之间出现意外的振荡波，并且在较小程度上从东到西。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Unexpected-six-month-pattern-of-COVID-19-cases-discovered-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Unexpected-six-month-pattern-of-COVID-19-cases-discovered-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46940baa-443a-4067-9d64-38ebc5171f30 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:26:20 -0400 Unexpected six-month pattern of COVID-19 cases discovered in the U.S.
